articles.author: Nicole Auerbach
articles.title: Curt Cignetti staying at Indiana isn't just good for the school. It's also a win for college football. - NBC Sports
articles.description: How many times do we see a coach take a program to new heights only to jump to a job he thinks is bigger and better?
articles.content:
This week, Indiana University decided to make its football coach the third-highest paid coach in the country.
Wait a second.
